udm_books.title: Drupal Migrations
udm_books.description:
Author: Mauricio

This book covers Migrate API concepts for Drupal 8/9 and beyond.

The examples include how to migrate from different sources into different destination entities. There are tips on planning migration projects and debugging errors.

Topics: drupal, migrations

udm_books.title: Drupal Upgrades
udm_books.description:
Author: Wendy, Mauricio

Learn to use the Migrate API to upgrade your Drupal 6/7 site to Drupal 8/9.

The examples include how to perform changes in site architecture between the sites and tips on troubleshooting issues.

Topics: drupal, upgrades

udm_books.title: React.js Fundamentals
udm_books.description:
Author: Mary, Carlos

This book explains the basic concepts of ReactJS progressively.

You will learn how to convert a static site into a dynamic application.

The examples make use of the Hooks API.

Topics: reactjs, hooks, routing, form validation
